title: 2016 Snow Day?
body: Hey i was just wondering when will the 2016 Snow Day event start? And will last years Snow Day skins still be avaliable to purchase?

replies.body:
I dont think anyone is sure of its start date yet. 
(but i think everyone is really looking forward to it!)
And I think it is highly likely that you will be able to purchase old snow day skins as they have brought them back most years so far!

Which snow day skins are you after? out of interest.
Snow day Syndra is my personal favourite ^^
For sure Snow Day Syndra by far is my favourite skin. I also main Syndra.
snowday bard though with his adorable penguins, I mean how can you top that?

Not a clue, and yes.

I hope it's soon, I didn't play much the last time it snowed on the Rift.
